content: I wonder the real reason that we cannot afford the Universal Healthcare. Is that because of our national debt and deficit? Or is it because we can’t stop sending our troops around the world for war? What if we stop or reduce sending our troops around the world? Would that help to pay our national debt? I wonder the intelligence of our government when they have to borrow money from China to fight the Unnecessary- War in Iraq. Now Syria? If you often have to borrow money from your family members to give to the homeless people, Would you do it? What are we trying to achieve?
